action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the broom on the shelf, the potted plant on the counter and the plate in the wardrobe.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway, a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate and a book.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch and a chair. There are passages to a hallway, a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a bed and a wardrobe. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You put the book on the bed.
You take the book. In your inventory you have a plate and a book.
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.
You put the plate in the wardrobe.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch and a chair. There are passages to a hallway, a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet and a living room here.
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a potted plant and a book.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch and a chair. There are passages to a hallway, a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.
You put the potted plant on the counter.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.

> go to living room
> go to bedroom
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch and a chair. There are passages to a hallway, a bedroom and a kitchen here.

> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a broom closet and a living room here.
You don't need to open the 'broomcloset'.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the broom. In your inventory you have a broom and a book.

> go to living room
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
You can't go to a living room from here.

> go to hallway
> go to living room
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a broom closet and a living room here.

> go to living room
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch and a chair. There are passages to a hallway, a bedroom and a kitchen here.

> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
> take shelf
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a potted plant and a cupboard. The potted plant is on the counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.
You are in a pantry now. There are a shelf, a freezer, a table and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You put the broom on the shelf.
Model produced DONE action at turn 31, end episode.
